alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 7:37PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL BIG HORN AND NORTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 736 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northeast of Medicine Wheel, or 33 miles northeast of Lovell, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and wind gusts 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Big Horn and northwestern Sheridan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn
